author: G Harrington
comment: "Wear" is a reference to ANDROID WEAR devices. Samsung Gear watches use Tizen, and its apps are downloaded via the Samsung Apps store, or via the SamsungGear app for Android, NOT VIA GOOGLE PLAY STORE. As similar apps are also available there, those of you rating the ANDROID WEAR app badly because you're clueless should go try the software MADE FOR YOUR SAMSUNG DEVICE, and change your unfair rating of this one correspondingly. Your idiocy is mind-blowing. This s*** drives me nuts...

author: Aamirsohel khan
comment: Need some bugfixes as Video capturing works but photo doesn't, and phone app used to launch on launching wear app but that to stopped after recent update.

author: Shakir Ali
comment: It really works!! I'm really pleased.

author: Anh Tu
comment: Good

author: Omar Milan
comment: Unable to use on my Gear s3 Classic. It does just fine as a camera on my phone, but I already have that. My watch isn't able to take the photos nor the videos. I've gone through the app settings all over and can't seem to understand how to configure the app to my watch.. kinda disappointing. Please help, I was looking forward to using this.

author: Jason Armstrong
comment: I can't download it to my watch? Not in wear store just goes to phone?

author: ebi elyasi
comment: OK

author: omar ahmed
comment: try to make the screen or video appear on the watch pleas

author: Ian McCallum
comment: It's a fun app.  You can place your phone somewhere and use your watch to take a picture.  Then the picture appears on your watch.   Handy for nature pics, tricky or dangerous pics where you don't want to be too close, or fun catching candid shots or rare shots where you sit nearby, cam poised to catch the moment.  Maybe if distance range is sufficient you could put your phone on a drone and take aerial pictures.

author: Ethan S.
comment: Great app... Does what it says it does. I love it. The only thing I'd want to see is the auto focus working correctly because it doesn't really work now, and id love to see a timer for delay between when you touch the watch and when it takes a picture. Great other than that.

author: Jon Roberts
comment: Loved it. Pretty easy considering the limited amount of space on watches. Nifty wee app. Developer(s), this is a great app. Works amazing on my Sony Smart watch.  I'd recommend this over others as no ads AND I had another app LIKE this one, only this does what it says. Like I said, recommended to any smart watch users!

author: Mark Tomasulo
comment: Like this app a lot I was looking for a camera app and have tried a lot of them . Found this one and so happy I did. No adds and the ones who made it sound like way cool peeps. They like making good apps it's shows and to give it to us for free. A++ Like to know about more apps you all make if they work as well as this one ....Wow  All the best to you and yours. Good looking out.

author: Rusty Old Dog
comment: This app is awesome. Place your phone anywhere and take a picture. No timers, no stress about not getting the perfect family photo. Thank you!
Maybe I'm just a dumb old man, yet I can't figure out where the picture gets saved after I take it. I've checked my entire Gallery and I can't find the pictures I took with your app.

comment: I can't download it on my watch, does not pop up in the app store.

comment: Like the idea although it doesn't work on my android wear 2.0

comment: Simple and stable

author: anshul koli
comment: Good

author: Neil Myrick
comment: Just installed and seems to work great, but I don't understand why it says "Start Whistling!!!" On the phone screen. Also, why is it free if it has no ads? Where are the developers making their money?

reply.author: Vampdesigns
reply.content: We are very happy you like our app. Its free and with no ads just because I like making apps. Im just in it dor the stars :). The whistle message is part of another app i made called whistle cam where you can take pictures by whistling. I just forgot to take it out. I will remove it in the next version. Thanks again for your positive feedback

title: Works well

author: Dan L
comment: Only problem is there is no timer. So my right hand is on my watch in every pic i took.

reply.author: Vampdesigns
reply.content: Hi. If you enable sound, the picture will be taken after the sound is played. We will definitely implement a delay though. Thank you for the feedback

title: Decent

reply.content: What does that mean? Could we have some more info please?
